name: BootstrapLabs
overview:
BootstrapLabs is a Silicon Valley Business Lab and Accelerator, we build and accelerate great companies.

BootstrapLabs employ a very hands on and entrepreneurial approach, we support and advise startup entrepreneurs to help them execute to the best of their ability, and tap into the benefits of Silicon Valley.

BootstrapLabs itself becomes more like a set of extra co-founders or co-entrepreneur that work with the entrepreneurs in the trenches for the first 6 months, after we usually become close hands-on advisors.

Since the inception in 2008 until 2011, BootstrapLabs has helped European Technology startups connect and relocate to the Silicon Valley eco-system. Today these startups are valued at $100M+ and employ more than 85 people and 75%+ have been funded (at a total of more than $25M).

milestones.description: BoostrapLabs client Prezi, Inc closed a series A-round from Danish VC SunStone Capital. At the same time Twitter founder Jack Dorsey is coming onboard as an advisor to Prezi.
